comments.text:
STR:

1. create a query folder in bookmarks toolbar overflow with URI such as "place:tag=foo".
2. drag it onto a visible part of the toolbar

Expected: drops as a query folder on the toolbar

Actual: drops as a bookmark on the toolbar, with wrong favicon
comments.creator: hzbz@pm.me
comments.author: hzbz@pm.me
comments.raw_text:
STR:

1. create a query folder in bookmarks toolbar overflow with URI such as "place:tag=foo".
2. drag it onto a visible part of the toolbar

Expected: drops as a query folder on the toolbar

Actual: drops as a bookmark on the toolbar, with wrong favicon

comments.creator: xtc4uall@gmail.com
comments.author: xtc4uall@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: "Actual" happens for me also in non-overflowed State of the Bookmarks Toolbar on WinXP.
